title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 435.1 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 435.1 - Scope

State Regulations

This Part establishes standards for the authorization and
provision of respite care and services. These standards are applicable only to
respite care and services to be provided either as preventive services for
families or as foster care services for foster children and foster
families. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18

435.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
